function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on IoT in different sectors impacted by COVID-19 may overlook specific health risk mitigation strategies.","Impact":"Failure to address specific health risk mitigation strategies could lead to increased spread of contagious diseases in non-healthcare sectors.","Mitigation":"Conduct a comprehensive risk assessment to identify specific health risk factors and develop mitigation strategies for different sectors.","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring and data analysis, contactless technologies for reducing physical interactions, AI for predictive analysis of disease spread.","People":"Employers, employees, customers, visitors in non-healthcare sectors.","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health experts, employers, facility managers."}]}
